summary: Adds seven new blood potions for vampires created from raw animal meat and herbs.  Two versions - Vanilla and Hunterborn (for mods which add realistic meat amounts to animals).
descriptionHtml:
Adds seven new Blood Potions for vampires created from raw animal meat and herbs at the cooking spit. These new Animal Blood Potions duplicate the effect of the Dawnguard added Blood Potion. The mod comes in two formats: Vanilla and Hunterborn so that it can be used with mods which modify the meat amounts on animals or with the vanilla loot amounts. The potions are found under the Misc listing in the cooking menu.

List of blood potions added:

Potion of Deer Blood
Heals 100 health and restores 50 stamina and magic (standard blood potion effect)
2 (or 10) Deer Meat
2 Blue Mountain Flower

Potion of Goat Blood
Heals 100 health and restores 50 stamina and magic (standard blood potion effect)
2 (or 3) Leg of Goat
2 Blue Mountain Flower

Potion of Horker Blood
Heals 100 health and restores 50 stamina and magic (standard blood potion effect)
Stamina is increased by 25 points for 1200 seconds
2 (or 10) Horker Meat
2 Blue Mountain Flower
2 Lavender

Potion of Horse Blood
Heals 100 health and restores 50 stamina and magic (standard blood potion effect)
Stamina is increased by 25 points for 1200 seconds
2 (or 10) Horse Meat
2 Blue Mountain Flower
2 Lavender

Potion of Mammoth Blood
Heals 100 health and restores 50 stamina and magic (standard blood potion effect)
Stamina is increased by 25 points for 1800 seconds
Health is increased by 25 points for 1800 seconds
2 (or 3) Mammoth Snouts
4 Blue Mountain Flower
2 Lavender
1 Bear Claws

Potion of Ox Blood
Heals 100 health and restores 50 stamina and magic (standard blood potion effect)
Stamina is increased by 25 points for 1200 seconds
2 (or 10) Raw Beef
2 Blue Mountain Flower
2 Lavender

Potion of Rabbit Blood
Heals 100 health and restores 50 stamina and magic (standard blood potion effect)
Magicka is increased by 25 points for 1200 seconds
Restore 1 points of Magicka per second for 1200 seconds
6 (or 8) Rabbit Leg
2 Blue Mountain Flower
4 Jazbay Grapes

Installation: Should be fine to add via NMM or just add to your Data folder as it's just one esp file.
Un-Install: Remove the esp file via NMM or from your Data folder.
author: Kudara
